tasks.title: Add user authentication endpoint
tasks.description: Create a POST /api/auth/login endpoint that accepts email and password, validates credentials against the database, and returns a JWT token.

tasks.title: Create user profile page
tasks.description: Build a React component at /profile that displays user information including name, email, and avatar.

tasks.title: Add email notification service
tasks.description: Implement an email service using SendGrid for welcome emails and password reset.
